OrgName: Tesla Motors, Inc. and all its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries and affiliates
activities: Tesla collects and uses personal data to provide services to our customers, to comply with legal requirements, to complete sales, to monitor and improve our website, services, vehicles and other products, for internal business purposes, and for other purposes as disclosed to customers.
contactoff1: 3500 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA 94304
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected from potential and actual customers in person or via phone (manual), from Tesla's website and networks (electronic), and from Tesla vehicles and products (electronic).
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data: Judicial Arbitration and Mediation Services/Endispute (JAMS).
